title: Administrative Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Macomb Community College in Apr 2022
Interview Descriptions: Set up interview through email. interview was on Zoom with two office managers. About 30 mins. Asked various questions and allowed me to ask questions. Described job requirements and asked about scheduling.

title: Adjunct Professor Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Macomb Community College (Clinton Township, MI) in Jul 2018
Interview Descriptions: Met with Dean and Supervisor in a conference room.  Very informal and to the point.  They explained the hiring and job qualification process. I was contacted soon thereafter and advised there was an opening for me if I was interested.
Interview Questions: What is your level of experience?

title: Full Time Science Instructor Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Macomb Community College (Clinton Township, MI) in Jun 2018
Interview Descriptions: The interview included a set of predetermined questions that I had 30 minutes to review before beginning, a lesson demonstration (topic was sent a few days before the interview), and a content exam.  The second interview involved a new question set and the dean.
Interview Questions: Many had to do with teaching successes and challenges, several directed specifically toward teaching diverse student populations

title: Building Attendant Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. I interviewed at Macomb Community College (Warren, MI) in Oct 2016
Interview Descriptions: It was fairly easy going in tone.  But it was pretty tough on questions, esp. for such a basic position, but they probably get some hardcore duds applying that they need to weed out as well as possible.
Interview Questions: How did you deal with a difficult situation?

title: P/T Roles and Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 months. I interviewed at Macomb Community College
Interview Descriptions: Fairly smooth interview process. For many positions they will schedule you in ahead of time to review questions prior to the interview. For technical positions (even part time), a presentation is sometimes required.
Interview Questions: Describe a project that you managed and the outcome of the project.

title: Computer Lab Aide Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 6 months. I interviewed at Macomb Community College (Macomb, MI)
Interview Descriptions: Very laid back. The whole interview took about ten minutes. I was asked if I knew Microsoft Office and to show up on Monday. The interviewer was very nice and kind. On Monday, I was shown how everything worked and started my training.

title: Student Activities Aide Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at Macomb Community College (Warren, MI) in Aug 2013
Interview Descriptions: Relatively laid back interview that still covered all the important things. Questions involved ascertaining that the individual in question is a good fit for helping others in higher education. They want to know that you will work well with others and respect the chain of command. Come prepared with background information about what the department doors and what your individual position is for and you will do well.
Interview Questions: Working here involves working with people of different backgrounds and cultures, how well can you work with others of different backgrounds than yourself?

title: Lab Aide Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Macomb Community College (Warren, MI) in Aug 2013
Interview Descriptions: I applied in person and had the interview with the Associate Dean of the Department I'm working for the same day. As part of the interview I had to watch a 20 minute video about the college and how to work in team environment and how to act when there's an emergency in the college.
Interview Questions: General Questions such as; Education, Address, and Experience.

title: Staff Coordinator Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Macomb Community College (Warren, MI) in Jul 2013
Interview Descriptions: Met with the dean and his assistant. They used standard questions, which I had 15 minutes to look over prior to the interview. There were three other candidates. There was no second interview.
Interview Questions: How do you organize your work day?

title: Adjunct Instructor Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 2 days. I interviewed at Macomb Community College (Warren, MI) in May 2009
Interview Descriptions: Informal interview with a panel and one on one.
